tracks.title: The Slaughterer
tracks.lyrics:
One with violence, the slaughterer stands,
Flesh in his grip, blood on his hands.
Two eyes forward, the third looking back,
Haunted by whispers from the lives he’s sacked.

“Why did you take everything?” they cry,
Echoes of ghosts he can’t deny.

The slaughterer slaughters, he knows no remorse,
Carving through lives, on his chosen course.
The weight of the whispers, the ghosts in his ear,
But the slaughterer slaughters, drowning out fear.

He imagines the uses for muscle and bone,
Another victim, a kingdom he owns.
Drinking the blood, discarding the soul,
Just business as usual to make him whole.

“Why did you take everything?” they plead,
But the slaughterer only sees what he needs.

The slaughterer slaughters, he knows no remorse,
Carving through lives, on his chosen course.
The weight of the whispers, the ghosts in his ear,
But the slaughterer slaughters, drowning out fear.

Don’t concern yourself with what lies behind,
Behind slaughterhouse doors, the truth is blind.
He bears the burden, the price of the deed,
A man society forged to feed its need.

"He's wiping his hands on the front of his apron,
The slaughterer's moving to his next operation!"

The slaughterer slaughters, he knows no remorse,
Carving through lives, on his chosen course.
The weight of the whispers, the ghosts in his ear,
But the slaughterer slaughters, drowning out fear.

The ghosts keep calling, but he won’t look back,
The slaughterer slaughters; the world fades to black.
The world fades to black...

tracks.title: Haunted Crawlspace
tracks.lyrics:
There’s a heaviness in the air I can’t explain
Like I’m wading through shadows that leave no stain
I go through the motions, but something's amiss
A quiet dread that pulls me down into the abyss

I try to focus, I try to stay clear
But there’s a hum in my head I don’t want to hear
It’s woven in my steps, it's tangled in my veins
An unnamed fear hiding behind my pain

It’s a haunted crawlspace, I’m sinking inside
Where shadows of what I’ve buried still hide
Every step that I take, it pulls me down
I’m haunted by silence, and lost in the sound

I pass by mirrors but avoid my reflection
Afraid I might catch a glimpse of the infection
There’s something buried deep that I can’t define
It stirs in the silence of my fractured mind

It seeps through the cracks in the moments I hide
In the quiet, in the stillness, when I’m hollow inside
An ache I can’t trace, a shiver in my bones
A weight I carry but can’t call my own

It’s a haunted crawlspace, I’m sinking inside
Where shadows of what I’ve buried still hide
Every step that I take, it pulls me down
I’m haunted by silence, and lost in the sound

tracks.title: They Took Everything
tracks.lyrics:
They took everything from me,
And then some more.
Turned my pain into a spectacle,
Left my guts spilled on the floor.

They ate it up, they twisted it ‘round,
Filled in the blanks, dragged me down.

They took everything, left nothing behind,
Painted my anguish, distorted my mind.
Fed it to devils, let the darkness spread,
Now the world drinks blood from the hands of the dead.

They shat it out for all to see,
So the devil wouldn’t feel alone.
God-boys turned to rotten bastards,
Took his throne, made it their own.

They struck a match, they sparked a wave,
Shattered the skies, made the holy enslaved.

They took everything, left nothing behind,
Painted my anguish, distorted my mind.
Fed it to devils, let the darkness spread,
Now the world drinks blood from the hands of the dead.

The magic moment when the guts were spilled,
It wasn’t justice, it was hunger fulfilled.
A shockwave that silenced the faithful,
Sullied the name of a god once graceful.

Twisting truths, they sharpen the knife,
For more blood, they’ll take your life.

They took everything, left nothing behind,
Painted my anguish, distorted my mind.
Fed it to devils, let the darkness spread,
Now the world drinks blood from the hands of the dead.

They took everything.
They took it all.
And still, they call for more.

tracks.title: Ghosts Go Undetected
tracks.lyrics:
Ghosts go undetected,
No instruments can hear.
Their whispers slip through seismographs,
Their presence laced with fear.
In the jars of time, they’re blind, unaware,
Spinning in the silence, caught in despair.

Ghosts go undetected, but they haunt us still,
Lingering in the cracks, where silence kills.
They live in the walls, the corners of our shame,
Echoing our sins, repeating our names.

Acoustic waves pick up the cries,
Frequencies of past goodbyes.
They drift through rooms, through our dreams,
Burdened by all that was left unseen.
Their voices rise, but we turn away,
Afraid to admit what we’ve betrayed.

Ghosts go undetected, but they haunt us still,
Lingering in the cracks, where silence kills.
They live in the walls, the corners of our shame,
Echoing our sins, repeating our names.

Science cannot hold them,
Nor measure their weight.
They’re not bound by physics,
Only by our mistakes.
Ghosts go undetected.
They’re etched in the air.
In the breath of the guilty,
They’re always there.

Ghosts go undetected, but they haunt us still,
Lingering in the cracks, where silence kills.
They live in the walls, the corners of our shame,
Echoing our sins, repeating our names.

Dying in jars, blind and unaware.
Ghosts go undetected,
But we know they’re there.

tracks.title: Shifting Through Bone
tracks.lyrics:
Flesh rots like echoes, carved in stone,
Ashes to the wind, shifting through bone.
Cold hands trace the skulls of death scenes,
Every scream 
fades into dreams. 

Shifting through bone, dust and decay, 
no words left to say.
Numb to the weight of the earth and sky,
Shifting through bone, 
waiting to die. 

Eyes like embers, 
fading in dirt,
The bones creak softly, 
Breathe in the hurt.
Time devouring all, 
blood into stone,
Lost in the marrow, 
shifting through bone.

Shifting through bone, dust and decay,
no words left to say.
Numb to the weight of the earth and sky,
Shifting through bone, waiting to die.

Cracked and hollow, my skull hums a tune,
A song to the dead, a sliver of moon.
I dig through the graves, memories sewn,
Lost in silence, 
shifting through bone.

Shifting through bone, dust and decay,
no words left to say.
Numb to the weight of the earth and sky,
Shifting through bone, waiting to die.

tracks.title: Thirteen Steps
tracks.lyrics:
From the very first moment
I knew you were the one
Two hands reaching out
I think I'm in love
Three words to say
I take a deep breath
I count down from five
I'm scared to death
I dial your number 
A quarter past eight
I prayed you pick up
That I wasn't to late...

You explained the thirteen steps of falling out of love
Breaking down the reasons why it was never enough
Each step is a nail in the coffin of my heart
With surgical precision you proceed to carve us apart

21 reasons why you couldn't stay
34 nights sobbing where I lay
55 messages I wrote but never sent
89 moments in a spiral descent

You explained the thirteen steps of falling out of love
Breaking down the reasons why it was never enough
Each step is a nail in the coffin of my heart
With surgical precision you proceed to carve us apart

tracks.title: It Is What It Is (A Demon's Game)
tracks.lyrics:
The mail piled high
Left unopened 
the darkness thick 
light bulbs broken 
his thoughts are turning into something vile 
as he withers away trapped all the while 

the ceiling leaking 
Stained with mould
The telephone ripped right off the wall 
the demon’s hold so terribly strong 
the man will perish 
before too long 
searching for freedom 
but can't break through.
It is what it is 
and it can happened to you 
The man was lost to the demons game.
A soul once pure
now forever lame

The days and nights all blend as one 
The demons hold never to be undone 
the man's mind all shattered and torn 
no hope of leaving 
Forever forlorned  
He'll never break free 
He’ll never be whole
It is what it is
And it’s taken its toll
The man was lost to the demon’s game
A soul once pure now forever lame.
The king's kiss so sweet and sour 
took his souls in just under an hour
The man was left
To suffer alone
A broken soul
so far from home.

tracks.title: Swallowed By Static
tracks.lyrics:
Clearly I am somewhere that I don’t want to be
But I’ve exhausted all my options, it blindsided me
what I feared now is real, I never thought anyone would see
But the truth bled right through 
It’s all falling apart again, and I can’t pretend
But I still pay the price

Swallowed by static
Crushed by the noise
My screams, they ripple in the air
But no one hears a voice
Drowned out by the grind
The silence never finds me there

The storm inside keeps spinning
And my walls start caving in
I feel it burning underneath my skin
They say I don’t belong here, it’s not my place
But I can embrace this place as real
In the shadows, I’ll make my stand, and steal

Swallowed by static
Crushed by the noise
My screams, they ripple in the air
But no one hears a voice
Drowned out by the grind
The silence never finds me there

Now it has a face, I stare it down
It’s pulling me apart
I let it in, spit it out, as I lose my heart
Let the static come for me, I’m ready for the end
This long-time foe, a parasite I cannot mend

Swallowed by static
The noise, it never ends
I’m broken, twisted, torn apart, but still
I won’t pretend
Let the silence come, and drown the night again.

tracks.title: The Weight Of Rain
tracks.lyrics:
I didn’t realize at the time,
I was carrying the weight of the world around,
With the whole fucking globe tied to my back,
feeling catastrophic.

The rain pours down, it’s feeding the ground,
But it’s drowning me, I can’t make a sound,
Pressure’s building, can’t stand the strain,
I’m just trying to survive the weight of rain.

And I avoid people as much as I can,
Worried about getting caught in someone else’s plan.
But every step felt like sinking in mud,
Drowning in my own, self-inflicted flood.

I climb, but I slip, the rain’s pulling me down,
Can't stand up straight, in this kingdom I'll drown.

The rain pours down, it’s feeding the ground,
But it’s drowning me, I can’t make a sound,
Pressure’s building, can’t stand the strain,
I’m just trying to survive the weight of rain.

tracks.title: Overlooked
tracks.lyrics:
Some things I still miss, shadows I chase
Old chances lost, they slip without a trace
Grief carves its room in the hollowed-out parts
Grinding through bone, breaking my heart

Overlooked, in silence I stand
Bruised and broken, empty hand
I’ve died too many times to doubt
In this cage I can’t climb out

Life’s like a chainsaw, grinding inside
Cutting through dreams I left behind
I know the edge of awake and asleep
Where memories fade and shadows creep

Overlooked, in silence I stand
Bruised and broken, empty hand
I’ve died too many times to doubt
In this cage I can’t climb out

Living with ghosts I can’t forget
Each one a scar, a silhouette
I stand in the doorway, caught in between
What could have been and what I’ve seen

Some days I feel the weight, I know
But sometimes, maybe it doesn’t show
I’m overlooked, but I’m still here
Bound to this quiet, year after year

Overlooked, in silence I stand
Bruised and broken, empty hand
I’ve died too many times to doubt
In this cage I can’t climb out

tracks.title: Ugly Photos
tracks.lyrics:
I saw the cracks in the mirror’s frame,
The fear in my face was calling my name.
Hovering shadows, a ghost in the light,
Caught in the moment where wrong meets right.

What do I look like when I cry?
When the truth breaks through and the shadows die?
A fragile soul, stripped to the bone,
Facing the void, but never alone.

The mask dissolved in the tears I shed,
Every lie I lived came back from the dead.
I wore my sins like a second skin,
But they faded to dust as the light poured in.

The world is ugly, fleeting, bare,
But I’m still here, exposed and aware.

What do I look like when I cry?
When the truth breaks through and the shadows die?
A fragile soul, stripped to the bone,
Facing the void, but never alone.

I walked through a gallery of ugly faces,
Each one a whisper of forgotten places.
The images blurred, the colors ran,
A kaleidoscope of the person I am.

What do I look like when I cry?
When the truth breaks through and the shadows die?
A fragile soul, stripped to the bone,
Facing the void, but never alone.

tracks.title: Branches
tracks.lyrics:
i thought i was broken
i thought i was lost
but i was just walking
the longest cross
every detour
every scream
was just another limb
on the living dream
the tree holds it all

every word, every fall
each time i left
each time i stalled
and somewhere inside
the branching light
was the version of me
who finally got it right

these are the branches
i chose to climb
bleeding from bark
but gaining time
this is the version
that faced the flood
who found the source
and drank the blood

i’ve seen the roots
i’ve touched the stem
i’ve traced the pain
back to them
but this branch here
the one i'm on
is the song
where i belong

i saw other timelines
other selves
some who died
some who shelved
their truths
their voice
but i came back
and made the choice

these are the branches
that carried the weight
but also the ones
that led to the gate
this is the version
that didn’t fold
who turned the trauma
into gold

i’m still me
but more than before
the past is a forest
and i’ve opened the door

these are the branches

tracks.title: The Keeper
tracks.lyrics:
i keep it locked
deep in the bank
wrapped in static
coded in thanks
blades of stainless
thoughts too raw
can’t let ‘em see
what i really saw

i smile on cue
i breathe like i'm told
but there's blood in my teeth
and my hands gone cold
i learned to nod
i learned to stall
to keep the monster
behind the wall

don’t come knocking
you won’t like what answers
i buried my rage
and it bloomed like cancer

i am the keeper
of what can’t be said
memories locked
in white-hot dread
i don’t act out
but i still rehearse
a thousand deaths
in every verse

they think i’m healed
cause i stopped the scream
but i dream in crosshairs
and wake in the stream
of flickering visions
and surgical tape
of people i love
who i can’t keep safe

i don’t want to hurt
but i trained for war
and part of me’s waiting
to settle the score
don’t hand me peace
unless it’s earned
i built this calm
from the things i burned

i am the keeper
of what can’t be said
memories wrapped
in white-hot dread
i don’t act out
but i still rehearse
a thousand deaths
in every verse

i never touched ‘em
i just held the thought
and that's enough
to rot

tracks.title: Crack The Sky
tracks.lyrics:
From the heavens above
She descends in wrath
Cloaked in a storm
She carves her path
Eyes ablaze with the righteous fire
She's come to judge us
Lift us higher

Devine descent
She cracks the sky
Angels roar and demons cry
Mountains crumble at her fierce command
Salvation in the palm of her hand

With thunderous steps
The earth quakes
Sinners tremble as the righteous awake
Her voice a tempest
Her words a sword
In her shadows I find my lord

Crack the sky 
Let the heavens fall
Feel the echo of the ancient call
Stars align
Let the heavens sing
Cosmic truth on angel wings

Through the cosmic veil 
she rides the storm
mystical visions in her form
echoes of prophecy
whispers of fate
as she opens wide the celestial gate

Rivers of life flow from her glands
Washing over these barren lands
Through the chaos a path divine
In the cosmos our spirits align

In her gaze I find my place
Reflections of the cosmos in her face
With the weight of stardust and our sins
In the crack of the sky my journey begins

Crack the sky 
Let the heavens fall
Feel the echo of the ancient call
Stars align
Let the heavens sing
Cosmic truth on angel wings

tracks.title: Petrified Womb
tracks.lyrics:
To create, you gotta first carve a void, 
but i find nothing but noise, overgrown and destroyed. 
My head feels hollow, swaying side to side, 
No spark to light, no fire to provide. 

The root rotted out, no life to hold, 
Just frozen dirt, dark and cold. 
I dig with my hands, but they come up dry, 
I scream to the heavens, but get no reply. 

This place is a grave, the silence thick, 
Where life once grew, now makes me sick. 
A satellite spinning, no sign of a spark 
The horizon fades, swallowed by the dark. 

The womb turns cold, and the world goes mute, 
Not in flame or flood, but poisoned at the root. 
No seed will grow, no life will sing, 
The end comes softly when we fail to begin. 

But I won’t stop digging, clawing through the ash, 
Sifting through rubble for a spark to catch. 
My thoughts are like chains, heavy and slow, 
Dragging me deeper, far below. 

I push and I pull, like I'm stuck on repeat, 
But the harder I try, the farther I retreat 
Everything feels the same, the days blur and fade, 
Each one like the last, just a shade more gray. 

I pound on the walls, but they won’t break, 
Each breath I take feels like a mistake. 
They said creation’s messy, but this feels dead, 
Lost in the wreckage, hanging by a thread 

The womb turns cold, and the world goes mute, 
Not in flame or flood, but poisoned at the root. 
No seed will grow, no life will sing, 
The end comes softly when we fail to begin.

tracks.title: The Insects Have Finally Taken Over
tracks.lyrics:
I knew this day would come, saw it creeping near
All that was inside me is empty, bare, and clear
My universe is theirs now, taken bit by bit
Tiny creatures, endless names, feeding in the pit

Rage, hope, nothing, care –
Sell, cell, cry, despair!
Swarming over me
They’ve claimed the air I breathe

Words crawl from my mouth, they leave me numb and raw
They eat at my feelings, bite by vicious bite, they gnaw
Language is a parasite, crawling through my veins
Leaving nothing but echoes, empty space remains

Rage, hope, nothing, care –
Sell, cell, cry, despair!
Swarming over me
They’ve claimed the air I breathe

Crave the poison, make love to the pain
Stop reading, stop writing, let the bugs reign
My soul’s dissolved, my will is thin
The insects have finally taken me in

They whisper “FUCK, SHIT, DIE” from underneath my skin
Each word another dose of toxin sinking in
Vomit, spit, and numbness, swirling in their hive
I’m the hollow carcass that they’ve left behind alive

Rage, hope, nothing, care –
Sell, cell, cry, despair!
Swarming over me
They’ve claimed the air I breathe

Outside is a beautiful day, but I’m caged in here
Surrounded by the buzzing, every shadow reappears
The insects have taken over, their whispers fill your head
So close your eyes, surrender – You're better off dead

Rage, hope, nothing, care –
Sell, cell, cry, despair!
Swarming over me
They’ve claimed the air I breathe

tracks.title: Crimson Sky
tracks.lyrics:
Glassy gaze
Endless maze
Silent scream
Broken dream
Static hum
Drums that thrum
Lights that flick
Clock that ticks

End of my 
Crimson sky
Break of dawn 
Moving on

Echoes blend
Time to mend
Faded page
Quiet rage

End of my 
Crimson sky
Break of dawn 
Moving on

Lost in spin
Wearing thin
Breathe in deep
…

End of my 
Crimson sky
Break of dawn 
Moving on

tracks.title: The Gift
tracks.lyrics:
I see the cracks beneath the surface,
The weight of what we’ve built will fall.
I hear the ocean calling out now,
Waiting for the final call.
I’ve been holding this truth in silence,
A force that pulls me to the end,
To bring the flood, to break the surface,
And let the cleansing storm begin.

I have something for you
A wave to tear it down,
The gift to wash away the filth,
To drown this broken town.
I’m the catalyst, I’m the spark,
The one to heed your voice,
I have something for you
The gift of no more choice.

I see the cities washed in water,
I feel the earth beneath my feet.
I know I’m chosen for this moment,
To play the part, to bring defeat.
You called me forth, I see it clearly,
The wave will rise and cleanse the sky,
I’ve held this gift, it’s now in motion,
There’s no more time, we can’t deny.

I have something for you
A wave to tear it down,
The gift to wash away the filth,
To drown this broken town.
I’m the catalyst, I’m the spark,
The one to heed your voice
I have something for you
The gift of no more choice.

Tidal forces, rip the seams,
Let the water crush our dreams.
Rebirth will follow after death,
But first, the world must lose its breath.
This gift is mine to give to you
The flood will make it all come true.

I have something for you
A wave to tear it down,
The gift to wash away the filth,
To drown this broken town.
I’m the catalyst, I’m the spark,
The one to heed your voice—
I have something for you
The gift of no more choice.

And when the wave is crashing over,
And all the lies are washed away
Remember what I gave you,
The gift, the end, the price we pay.
